CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES( Case__r.Account.Send_Billing_To__c , "Client") && Entity_Type__c = "Client", true, false) || IF(INCLUDES( Case__r.Account.Send_Billing_To__c , "Health Plan") && Entity_Type__c = "Health Plan", true, false) || IF(INCLUDES( Case__r.Account.Send_Billing_To__c , "Law Firm") && Entity_Type__c = "Law Firm", true, false) || IF(INCLUDES( Case__r.Account.Send_Billing_To__c , "MCO") && Entity_Type__c = "MCO", true, false) || IF(INCLUDES( Case__r.Account.Send_Billing_To__c , "Provider") && Entity_Type__c = "Provider", true, false) || IF(INCLUDES( Case__r.Account.Send_Billing_To__c , "Provider Representative") && Entity_Type__c = "Provider Representative", true, false) || IF(INCLUDES( Case__r.Account.Send_Billing_To__c , "Representative") && Entity_Type__c = "Health Plan", true, false)
CustomField.label: Send Billing To
